title: Bulletin
title-note: State Geological and Natural History Survey of Connecticut
additional-notes: Some issues of this series may have distinctive titles.  Before concluding that such an issue is in the public domain, search for book renewals under its distinctive title. We have not systematically searched individual issue titles.
Spot-checks of issues available on HathiTrust did not turn up copyright notices, but we do not know whether the issues they do not have open have notices.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Iren Sokolova for copyright research on this title.
